class night_horizons.transformers.filters.AltitudeFilter(column: str = 'mAltitude', float_altitude: float = 13000.0)¶

Bases: Filter

class night_horizons.transformers.filters.Filter(condition, apply=True)¶

Bases: TransformerMixin, BaseEstimator

Simple estimator to implement easy filtering of rows. Does not actually remove rows, but instead adds a selected column.
